text:
August 28, 1961
Hr. William G. Harley
NAEB
DuPont Circle Office Bldg.
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Mr. Harley:
This is to acknowledge your letter
of August 25th to Dr. Becker. He is out
of town but I do expect him back about
the middle of September. Your letter will
receive his prompt attention as soon as
possible.
Yours truly.
(Mrs.) Mavis Wieneke
Secretary
